page.title: 18RECREATION-INTERESTS
page.content: {GAMES,SPORTS,HOBBIES AND LEISURE {ACTIVITIES OF YOUTH}ARE LISTED;IT IS HOPED THAT SAME{GOOD HUMOUR,INTEREST {AND ENTHUSIASM}FOR THEM IS CARRIED ON INTO ADULT LIFE.{GAMES-}CHESS,SNAKES & LADDERS,DRAUGHTS,DRAGONS & DUNGEONS, COMPUTER GAMES,MONOPOLY,CARD GAMES BATTLESHIPS.{SPORTS-}FOOTBALL,SWIMMING RUGBY,CRICKET,TENNIS,DIVING,BADMINTON, ATHLETICS,ROUNDERS,ORIENTEERING,VOLLEY BALL,SAILING(EXTERNAL).{HOBBIES-}BELL RINGING,STAMPS,MODELS,JIGSAWS,DRAWING, PAINTING,MATHS CLUB,DIY.{LEISURE-}GYM, SCOUTS,CUBS,GUIDES,BROWNIES,NATURE, CROSSWORDS,READING,MUSIC,GARDENING, WALKING,THINKING AND LISTENING.{THE {AREA HAS CERTAINLY BENEFITTED BY {TEACHER,PARENT AND ADULT INTEREST IN {THESE ACTIVITIES AS WE RARELY SUFFER {FROM THE INDISCRETIONS OF YOUTH SO {OFTEN REPORTED FROM TOWN AND CITY. "THE FAMILY HAS ALL TO OFFER YOUTH"
